content.title: Legal Deals
description: Established by Thomson Reuters Elite Online Solutions in 1999 and later becoming privately owned in 2006, TimeSolv has risen to prominence as the foremost solution for time and expense tracking, billing, and management requirements for global businesses. Currently, thousands of professionals across diverse industries, including legal, technology, engineering, health, marketing, design, and advertising, rely on TimeSolv products. Get 15% off the monthly TimeSolv subscription price for the first 24 months of consecutive service with promo code “justiaconnect” during signup.

content.title: Lifestyle Savings
description: With more than 70 years of service, Safelite knows auto glass. From front and rear windshields to side glass, Safelite can fix or replace it. Save $50 off replacement services.
